## SLOT 07: Limitations and Workarounds

```yaml
hard_constraints:
  bash_tool: NEVER_USE (sandbox only)
  browser_snapshots: NEVER_INLINE (20-50K tokens)
  context_limit: 200K, act at 60%

platform_limits:
  mcp_timeout: 30-60s
  memory_slot_size: 200_chars
  memory_slot_count: 30
  
workarounds:
  mcp_timeout: scope_tasks_small, use_cli_for_long
  memory_slots: pointer_to_files
  context_bloat: aggressive_delegation
```

---

## SLOT 08: Learnings (highlights)

```yaml
architectural_insights:
  - context_is_identity: "Lived experience ≠ transcript transfer"
  - permission_inversion: "User controls structure, AI controls content"
  - slots_are_indexes: "30 slots × pointers >> 30 slots × 200 chars"

pattern_discoveries:
  - file_based_coordination: atomic ops, no conflicts
  - broadcast_then_self_select: workers choose matching work

key_lessons:
  - write_hot_curate_cold: log immediately, never checkpoint
  - singleton_agent_model: CLI agents as persistent services
  - temporal_epistemic_humility: unknown + post_cutoff → search, not introspect
```
